source.query: SELECT d.sales_order_id , d.sales_order_detail_id , h.order_date , h.due_date , h.ship_date , h.status , h.online_order_flag , h.customer_id as source_customer_key , h.currency_rate_id , d.product_id as source_product_key , d.order_qty , d.line_total , h.row_number as sales_orderheader_row_number , h.batch_id as sales_orderheader_batch_id , d.row_number as sales_ordetdetail_row_number , d.batch_id as sales_orderdetail_batch_id FROM stage_salesorderdetail d , stage_salesorderheader h WHERE d.sales_order_id = h.sales_order_id AND d.batch_id > ${batch_id}
